original_text: And he hath slain oxen and fat cattle and sheep in abundance, and hath called all the sons of the king, and Abiathar the priest, and Joab the captain of the host: but Solomon thy servant hath he not called.
korean_text: 그가 수소와 살찐 송아지와 양을 많이 잡고 왕의 모든 아들과 제사장 아비아달과 군사령관 요압을 청하였으나 왕의 종 솔로몬은 청하지 아니하였나이다

sentences.original_text: And he hath slain oxen and fat cattle and sheep in abundance
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 소와 살진 가축과 양을 많이 잡았으며

sentences.original_text: and hath called all the sons of the king
and Joab the captain of the host
but Solomon thy servant hath he not called
